amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any of the funds authorized in the bill from being used for a Congressional earmark.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 111-475 to prohibit any of the funds authorized in the bill from being used for a Congressional earmark.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
